name: Shady Rider 2D
description:
Welcome to Shady rider 2, the ultimate obstacle course for Gameboy!

 Get ready for the most thrilling and challenging racing experience of your life!(meh...)

 Shady rider is an action-packed racing game that will test your skills and reflexes.
In this game, you'll need to navigate through a series of obstacles, and race to the finish line as fast as you can.
So, gear up and let's get started!

Gameplay:

The gameplay of Shady-rider is simple yet addictive.

 You'll take control of a high-speed racing car and navigate through a variety of obstacle courses.

 Your goal is to reach the finish line as quickly as possible while avoiding obstacles.
